transcript: I don't mind what you do, see. You can paint your body green all over and dance naked through the palace venom and run out with every man in the world. And I shouldn't say a word as long as I know that you love me best.

segments.text: I don't mind what you do, see.
You can paint your body green all over and dance naked through the palace venom and
run out with every man in the world.
And I shouldn't say a word as long as I know that you love me best.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I don't mind what you do, see, you could paint your body green all over and dance naked through the Place Vendome and run off with every man in the world.  And I shan't say a word as long as I know that you love me best.
